languages.text: "И из всех, кого он мог выбрать объектом своего внимания... мон-кай. Что бы не творилось у него в голове — это будет или величайший фарс, или хорошо поставленная катастрофа".
"And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."
languages.original_text: "И из всех, кого он мог выбрать объектом своего внимания... мон-кай. Что бы не творилось у него в голове — это будет или величайший фарс, или хорошо поставленная катастрофа".

traits.locale_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “他本可以在所有人中随便挑选一个，作为他关注的对象……可他偏偏选择了一只猴子。虽然不知道他在策划什么，但那要么是场盛大的闹剧，要么是场精心设计的灾难。”
languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: “他本可以在所有人中随便挑选一个，作为他关注的对象……可他偏偏选择了一只猴子。虽然不知道他在策划什么，但那要么是场盛大的闹剧，要么是场精心设计的灾难。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Et il a fallu qu'il jette son dévolu sur {mf|un|une} mon-keigh... Quoi qu'il mijote, c'est soit une farce bien ficelée, soit une calamité parfaitement chorégraphiée. »
languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: « Et il a fallu qu'il jette son dévolu sur {mf|un|une} mon-keigh... Quoi qu'il mijote, c'est soit une farce bien ficelée, soit une calamité parfaitement chorégraphiée. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Y de todos los candidatos a los que podía dedicar su atención... ha elegido a un{mf||a} mon-keigh. No sé lo que trama, pero será una farsa sublime o una calamidad con coreografía».
languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: «Y de todos los candidatos a los que podía dedicar su atención... ha elegido a un{mf||a} mon-keigh. No sé lo que trama, pero será una farsa sublime o una calamidad con coreografía».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「それにあらゆるものの中で、アイツが注意を向けるよう選んだのは…モン＝ケイだ。その筋書きがどうであれ、壮大な茶番になるか見事な演出の厄災になるかのどちらかだな」
languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: 「それにあらゆるものの中で、アイツが注意を向けるよう選んだのは…モン＝ケイだ。その筋書きがどうであれ、壮大な茶番になるか見事な演出の厄災になるかのどちらかだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Und von allen, die er zum Objekt seiner Aufmerksamkeit hätte machen können ... wählt er einen Chem-Pan-Sey. Was er auch im Schilde führt, es wird entweder eine gewaltige Farce oder eine gut choreografierte Katastrophe."
languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: "Und von allen, die er zum Objekt seiner Aufmerksamkeit hätte machen können ... wählt er einen Chem-Pan-Sey. Was er auch im Schilde führt, es wird entweder eine gewaltige Farce oder eine gut choreografierte Katastrophe."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

languages.text: "Dikkatini verebileceği onca kişi varken gidip bir mon-keigh seçti. Planladığı şey her neyse ya büyük bir saçmalık ya da iyi ayarlanmış bir felaket olacak."
languages.original_text: "And out of everyone he could have chosen as the object of his attention... he chose a mon-keigh. Whatever he is plotting, it will be either a grand farce or a well-choreographed calamity."

traits.locale_text: "Dikkatini verebileceği onca kişi varken gidip bir mon-keigh seçti. Planladığı şey her neyse ya büyük bir saçmalık ya da iyi ayarlanmış bir felaket olacak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
